channel.title: How do i change 317 rsps background & titlebox?
channel.description: I see people with 317 servers that have their server name on their background instead of runescape's. and they have custom titlebox's that have welcome to *their server* and the font will be red,blue,green.. How can i do all of that stuff??

item.title: How do i change 317 rsps background & titlebox?
item.description:
@202685 wrote:

look for background.png first of all for background. of in my case. deltascape.png… but if u cant find it, i cant help… then for like the title box, go to client.java and look for the name thats there already lets say its Example. hit ctr + h… then look for Example and replace with your server name

Read full topic
item.source: How do i change 317 rsps background & titlebox?
